about_the_game:
Love Kainga and want to see more?

This official Kainga support pack is a cosmetics-only DLC that allows you to switch the outfits of all 8 Thinkers to newly designed alternatives for that extra bit of flair!

Why have a DLC?


I wanted to add an optional DLC that allowed players who enjoy Kainga to further support the game's development and get something nice in return. It was important that those that cannot afford to pay extra can still get the full Kainga experience, so I've been releasing all gameplay content for free.

To create this DLC I drew over 450 new frames of animations to bring these new Thinker designs to life!

What are the new outfits?


Each outfit is imagined to be a parallel design to the current Thinker outfits, but fully unique! The designs were created to follow the "B-Side" alternative versions of the Thinkers released in update 1.1 for all. You do NOT need this DLC to play the alternative versions of each Thinker, but it could add some cosmetic flair.

Wait what? You can play alternative versions of each Thinker?


That's right! You can unlock the "B-Side" of each Thinker which comes with a new starting loadout, 3 new festivals and a new bonus passive technology. You can unlock these right now in the base game by doing just one of the following:

  • Unlocking all the basic technologies in the shop
  • Unlocking all the Thinkers
  • Mastering one Thinker

Then, you'll see a quest to access the B-Sides of Thinkers! Pretty cool, right?

So if you're feeling fancy and want to spice up how your new Thinkers look, this cosmetic DLC is for you!

Important note: The contents of this Pack are cosmetic only!

Join the Kainga Community
Kainga is developed by me, Erik, and I’d love to hear your thoughts! Join our to get involved with updates and share your thoughts on the game - I’d love to hear from you!

short_description: Love Kainga and want to dive deeper into the lore? Want to give back to the development of Kainga? This official Kainga support pack is a cosmetics-only DLC that allows you to switch the outfits of all 8 Thinkers to newly designed alternatives for that extra bit of flair!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Russian
